title: Suryakumar Yadav ruled out of T20I series vs Sri Lanka
content: The Indian cricket team suffered a double injury blow ahead of the three-match T20I series against Sri Lanka as white-ball specialists Suryakumar Yadav and Deepak Chahar have been ruled out of the upcoming home series.While Deepak Chahar sustained a hamstring injury while bowling in the third T20I against West Indies, Suryakumar reportedly suffered a hairline fracture in his hand. As per reports, Suryakumar was present in the practice session ahead of the series in Lucknow but has now been declared unfit.
